ValidationRule.description: Based on the choice of lead source, a referrer must be specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IsConverted && ConvertedDate > DATE(2024,04,15) && ISBLANK(Referrer__c) && (ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Introducer") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Employee Referral") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Client Referral")) && BetaProcess__c
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A referrer is required given the lead source.
